name: Samrau
shortLoreBlurb: Samrau is a deity/creature from Bashkir linked to sky bird, sun. Connected to tempests and rulership omens.
overlapsLinks: Amaterasu (Japan), Indra (Vedic), Perun (Slavic), Ra (Egyptian), Surya (Hindu), Thor (Norse), Zeus (Greek)
description: Samrau is a deity/creature from Bashkir linked to sky bird, sun. Connected to tempests and rulership omens.
